## ConstructSliceFromPath type

Constructs an nested object according to TPath with TValue as value for last subpath.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ConstructSliceFromPath<TPath extends string, TObject> = TPath extends `${infer LeftSide}.${infer RightSide}` ? LeftSide extends keyof TObject ? {
    [P in LeftSide]: ConstructSliceFromPath<RightSide, TObject[LeftSide]>;
} : never : TPath extends keyof TObject ? {
    [P in TPath]: TObject[TPath];
} : never;
```
<b>References:</b> [ConstructSliceFromPath](./global-types.constructslicefrompath.md)
